about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the captivating story of the Aztecs and their intricate relationships with the gods, develop trade, build a city, and try to teach the Aztec god Huitzilopochtli to embrace veganism!

In this game, we’ve introduced changes to Match-3 gameplay and revamped the logic behind mahjong layout designs.

The game features numerous Match-3 levels with diverse mechanics, as well as bonus games that are completely skippable—you can play them after finishing the main game or skip them altogether. Additionally, you’ll need to build a brand-new city.
- 90 new replayable Match 3 levels ( relaxed/limited moves/timed )
- 8 skippable tricky Spot The Difference scenes
- 20 skippable Mahjong games
- 20 skippable Block games
- hidden treasures
And a story and the town to build!

name: Laruaville 16

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10,11
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directX 8.1 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 8.1a
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: directX 8.1 compatible
